Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8181 EAST TUFTS AVENUE,SUITE 510 UNIT 1, DENVER, Colorado, 80237, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hycroft Mining Holding Corp is a gold and silver producer. Its operating mine, the Hycroft Mine, is an open-pit heap leach operation located approximately 54 miles west of Winnemucca, Nevada.
